item.title: Core Values Activity
item.description: Repost of my Core Values Activity - originally posted on 2024-06-16 1. Core Values and Core Principles Activity Guide Core Values Activity Tracks Part 1. Core Values Journey (~50 minutes) Part 2. Core Values Circle (For Teams) Introduction Regrouping Initial Picks - 20 Chosen Throw Everything on the Board Grouping The Method: Revise, Combine, Delete The Journey Grouping 1st Toll Round 1 2nd Toll Round 2 3rd Toll Round 3 4th Toll Round 4 5th Toll Round 5 Final Toll 2.
